snippet.title: The Escapists 2: Pocket Breakout - Announcement Trailer (iOS, Android, Amazon)
snippet.description:
The Escapists 2: Pocket Breakout launches on iOS, Android and Amazon devices on January 31st 2019.
Pre-register on iOS: http://bit.ly/TE2PocketBreakoutiOS
Pre-register on Android: http://bit.ly/TE2PocketBreakoutAndroid

Official website: https://www.team17.com/games/the-escapists-2/
Follow The Escapists on Twitter: https://twitter.com/Escapists_Game
Like The Escapists on Facebook: https://www.facebook.com/TheEscapistsGame/
Follow Team17 on Twitter: https://twitter.com/Team17Ltd
Like Team17 on Facebook: https://www.facebook.com/Team17/
Join the discussion on Discord: http://discord.gg/team17

The Escapists 2: Pocket Breakout features:  
- A dedicated tutorial for new players to learn the basics of prison life   
- 5 unique prisons to escape from: Precinct 17, Center Perks 2.0, Rattlesnake Springs, K.A.P.O.W Camp and Area 17 
- Local multiplayer for up to 4 players  
- Customise your inmate with new customisations to create your perfect prisoner  
- Buy, barter and beat your way to acquiring the much-needed items to create dozens of crafting combinations to aid your escape! 
- Put the craft in crafty! Scheme, sneak and traverse through prison life. Forge friendships and pull the wool over guards’ eyes as you use your skills and wits to plot your escape!
- Participate in prison routines like roll call, exercise or job time to blend in so guards don’t suspect a thing…

About Team17 Digital Ltd
Founded in 1990, Team17 Digital Limited is a leading international games label that hosts the Worms franchise, Aven Colony, The Escapists, Genesis Alpha One, Overcooked, Sword Legacy: Omen, Yoku’s Island Express, Yooka-Laylee and many more from developers around the world. Visit www.team17.com for more info. 
bit.ly/SubTeam17
